documents.id: Connect to SOLIDWORKS Message Pump to Handle Keystrokes and Accelerator Keys (C#)
documents.title: Connect to SOLIDWORKS Message Pump to Handle Keystrokes and Accelerator Keys (C#)
documents.summary: This example shows how to connect to a SOLIDWORKS message pump by creating, installing, and uninstalling a hook for a modeless dialog box or PropertyManager page for intercepting keystrokes and handling accelerator keys.
